text:
Okay, Producer.
Pretend to be one of the fans, please~!

We always support you!
Keep doing your best!

...Mei?
It's okay to let go now.

Haha, I just got influenced
by an interview I read a while ago.

"Try to hold hands as long as possible during handshake
events to convey my gratitude", it said~!

Haha... if you put it that way, I'd never
be able to let go of Producer's hand~
